Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: https://github.com/StakedChain/StakedNotary/blob/master/utxosplitter.sh

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: that contains the fix.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: basically if it falls so far under your limit... or 0 ... you know its fauiling to split

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so you send the balance to self, and wiat fior confirm before issuing the split fund

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: that also contains an error check, that will fail to do anything if there are 0 uspsents (its already sent to self but isnt confirmed)

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I run this every 15mins and its working perfectly
